DistDefinition: By starting a Unicity business, you’ll have the opportunity to earn commissions and bonuses on referral customer purchases as you help others Make Life Better.
PCdefinition: By joining Unicity as a Preferred Customer, you'll receive an instant discount on all Unicity products.
memberdefnition: New! Fast and easy Member Program enables anybody to experience Unicity’s world-class and life-changing products as a Member. No startup fee required. Includes wholesale pricing, and product credit loyalty program. Click, Save, Make Life Better!
